languages.text: "Значит, пришло время сыграть финальную сцену, мон-кай. Танцуй так, как никогда не танцевал{mf||а}!" {n}Арлекин наиграно кланяется и зажимает кнопку на странном устройстве в руках.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Значит, пришло время сыграть финальную сцену, мон-кай. Танцуй так, как никогда не танцевал{mf||а}!" {n}Арлекин наиграно кланяется и зажимает кнопку на странном устройстве в руках.{/n}
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Then it is time for the closing scene, mon-keigh. Dance like never before!" {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically as he presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Значит, пришло время сыграть финальную сцену, мон-кай. Танцуй так, как никогда не танцевал{mf||а}!" {n}Арлекин наиграно кланяется и зажимает кнопку на странном устройстве в руках.{/n}

traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "Then it is time for the closing scene, mon-keigh. Dance like never before!" {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically as he presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n}
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: 「終いの場面が来たよ、モン＝ケイ。こんなダンスは初めてさ！」{n}ハーレクィンは観客に向けるようにお辞儀をすると、手にしていた見慣れぬ装置のボタンをぐっと押し続ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then it is time for the closing scene, mon-keigh. Dance like never before!" {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically as he presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「終いの場面が来たよ、モン＝ケイ。こんなダンスは初めてさ！」{n}ハーレクィンは観客に向けるようにお辞儀をすると、手にしていた見慣れぬ装置のボタンをぐっと押し続ける。{/n}
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: “是时候落幕了，猴子。一起跳起疯狂的舞蹈吧！”{n}丑角戏剧性地鞠了一躬，按住了手中古怪装置的按钮。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then it is time for the closing scene, mon-keigh. Dance like never before!" {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically as he presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “是时候落幕了，猴子。一起跳起疯狂的舞蹈吧！”{n}丑角戏剧性地鞠了一躬，按住了手中古怪装置的按钮。{/n}
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: « L'heure du dénouement a sonné, mon-keigh. Dansez comme vous n'avez jamais dansé auparavant ! » {n}L'Arlequin s'incline comme s'il saluait son public puis appuie sur un bouton de l'étrange appareil qu'il tient en main.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then it is time for the closing scene, mon-keigh. Dance like never before!" {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically as he presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « L'heure du dénouement a sonné, mon-keigh. Dansez comme vous n'avez jamais dansé auparavant ! » {n}L'arlequin s'incline comme s'il saluait son public puis appuie sur un bouton de l'étrange appareil qu'il tient en main.{/n}
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: «Entonces esta es la última escena, mon-keigh. ¡Baila como nunca has bailado!». {n}El Arlequín te dedica una reverencia teatral mientras pulsa el botón del extraño dispositivo que porta en la mano.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then it is time for the closing scene, mon-keigh. Dance like never before!" {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically as he presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Entonces esta es la última escena, mon-keigh. ¡Baila como nunca has bailado!». {n}El Arlequín te dedica una reverencia teatral mientras pulsa el botón del extraño dispositivo que porta en la mano.{/n}
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Dann ist nun Zeit für die letzte Szene, Chem-Pan-Sey. Tanzt wie nie zuvor!" {n}Der Harlekin verneigt sich theatralisch und drückt und hält eine Taste auf dem merkwürdigen Gerät in seiner Hand.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then it is time for the closing scene, mon-keigh. Dance like never before!" {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically as he presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Dann ist nun Zeit für die letzte Szene, Chem-Pan-Sey. Tanzt wie nie zuvor!" {n}Der Harlekin verneigt sich theatralisch und drückt und hält eine Taste auf dem merkwürdigen Gerät in seiner Hand.{/n}
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "O hâlde son perdeye geçelim mon-keigh. Hiç etmediğin gibi dans et!" {n}Sahnedeymişçesine reverans yapan Arleken, elindeki tuhaf cihazın üzerindeki bir düğmeye basıp ardından basılı tutuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then it is time for the closing scene, mon-keigh. Dance like never before!" {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically as he presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "O hâlde son perdeye geçelim mon-keigh. Hiç olmadığı gibi dans et!" {n}Sahnedeymişçesine reverans yapan Arleken, elindeki tuhaf cihazın üzerindeki bir düğmeye basıp basılı tutuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
